name: VR Drivers
description:
Race your fast-paced racing car on specially prepared tracks in VR Drivers game. Sit in your chair, put on the goggles of virtual reality, grip the steering wheel and feel like a professional driver. Race with computer opponents and improve your race record.

The game uses Oculus Rift technology, Logitech G29 Driving Force steering wheel, but there is also the possibility of playing with Xbox/XInput gamepad.

The gameplay consists of finishing a race on three fully original tracks.

Persons with vision defects, to take part in the game, should take care to wear contact lenses.
